abort.missing_configuration: The TMB integration is not configured. Please follow the documentation.

ibus.description: Create a sensor to track the remaining time of the next bus in an specific bus station.
ibus.title: iBus

planner.description: Create a sensor to get the travel time between two locations in Barcelona.
planner.title: Planner

select.description: Select **iBus** service to get the remainng time for the next bus on a given stop, or select **Planner** to get the time travel between two locations.
select.title: Select a service
